description: {"blocks":[{"key":"6gpu1","text":"This protocol details the procedure of nuclei isolation and debris removal from fresh frozen brain tissue in preparation for the 10X Genomics multiome ATAC/GEX assay. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
keywords: ASAPCRN,single nuclei preparation, multiome, snATAC-seq, snRNA-seq,10X Genomics

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"2ttej","text":"Prepare the 2X salt-Tris solution and aliquot to 1 ml tube and freeze at -20°C","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"e9s67","text":"Prepare the BSA in PBS and filter through 0.2um filter.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3qreh","text":"Prepare the Tween-20 Homogenization lysis buffer fresh for each preperations","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"8q804","text":"Filter sucrose 2M solution through 0.2um/0.45um filter","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"16gi5","text":"Prepare cOmplete protease inhibitor (50X) by dissolving a tablet in 1 mL of water.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"7v12m","text":"Filter protease inhibitor solution through 0.2um filter","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9ue0i","text":"Place the homogenizer at -80°C at the start and leave 10 min before homgenization on ice.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ffd27","text":"Cut brain piece on dry ice (if a large section), then transfer immediately in homogenizer containing 250 uL of TST+NP Homogenization Lysis Buffer. Immediately add 500uL TST+NP Homogenization Lysis Buffer","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"eoasa","text":"Allow the tissue to thaw for 2 mins in the homogenization buffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f17e8","text":"Homogenize tissue with pestle A (10X), wait 1min, and with pestle B (10X).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2c8l3","text":"Put the homogenate through 70µm cell strainer and place the falcon on ice. Incubate on ice for 5 mins. Rinse dounce and filter with 250uL TST+NP HB.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ac6qv","text":"During the incubation (in about 4 mins), use LUNA-fl counter to assess the viability of the nuclei.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"q323","text":"Transfer the contents from the 50 mL falcon to a 2 mL protein lo-bind tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"2ckvl","text":"Centrifuge @ 500xg for 5 mins. Discard the supernatant.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d0ukg","text":"Resuspend the pellet in 200 uL of Wash Buffer 1, and transfer to a 2mL DNA lobind tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"1qevo","text":"Add additional 320 uL Wash Buffer 1 to a final volume of 520 uL.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"63emk","text":"Add 520uL of Gradient medium to sample (Vf = 1040 uL).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"6kmef","text":"Layer 770 uL of 29% Cushion in the ultracentrifuge tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"86o7n","text":"Layer the sample on top of cushion using a P1000, without disturbing the cushion.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"97qi6","text":"Optional: Check tube weight, adjust weight to counter differences.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5h5cn","text":"Centrifuge at least 3,000 rcf in a swinging bucket, at 4°C for 20 minutes with brake off.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"87jaq","text":"Remove supernatant, remove the lower supernatant with P200, leaving about  50-100 uL.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2d493","text":"Gently resuspend nuclei in ultracentrifuge tube and transfer to 1.5 mL DNA lobind tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"lkd1","text":"Rinse ultracentrifuge tube with Wash buffer 2 and transfer also to 1.5 mL DNA lobind tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"6cabg","text":"Centrifuge @ 350-450xg for 5 mins. Discard the supernatant.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"cbk4u","text":"Resuspend in 0.1x lysis buffer (200 uL) and gently pipetmix 5x","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"7jbk0","text":"Incubate on ice for 2 min","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"7e7q","text":"Add Wash buffer 2 (1mL) \u0026 gently pipetmix 5x","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"uilk","text":"Centrifuge @ 350-450xg for 5 mins. Discard the supernatant.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"4k8i7","text":"Resuspend in 1X Diluted Nuclei buffer. Count","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: Nuclei isolation and permeabilisation of fresh frozen human brain samples for 10X Genomics Multiome
title_html: Nuclei isolation and permeabilisation of fresh frozen human brain samples for 10X Genomics Multiome

versions.title: Nuclei isolation and permeabilisation of fresh frozen human brain samples for 10X Genomics Multiome
